name: Ninja Hanrei
description:
Ninja Hanrei is a 2D run and gun Platformer game inspired on Ancient Japan but with Super Powers.


Explore 2 Worlds with 14 long Levels each one.
Kill all the enemies you found.
Jump correctly all the Platforms.
Collect all the coins.
Survive and Destroy the two bosses in Game.
Make your highest score on the Endless Mode
Unlock Powers of 6 different types.
Buy Skins on the shop.


The game has a Pixel Art Platforms and Background Painted Digitally.
The Music has been made with traditional and modern oriental instruments.

The Game Will be Updated, with more skins, Levels and Worlds.
